title: Update admin server status label from “Local Offline” to “Online”

requirements.summary: Replace the admin-mode server status indicator label “Local Offline” with “Online” wherever that specific label is rendered.
acceptanceCriteria: When server access is disabled (admin-only toggle off) and the server status indicator is visible, the UI does not display the text "Local Offline" anywhere.
The UI displays "Online" instead of "Local Offline" in the relevant admin-mode server status/indicator location(s).
No other server status labels (e.g., "Checking…", "Offline") are unintentionally changed.

file_operations.description: Update the serverAccessEnabled=false branch to render the status text as "Online" instead of "Local Offline", without changing any other status labels or conditions.
